item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, March 27, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Blender releases their Oscar winning version tool (444 points | 125 comments)
2. OpenAI adds MCP support to Agents SDK (561 points | 176 comments)
3. Debian bookworm live images now reproducible (539 points | 114 comments)
4. A love letter to the CSV format (438 points | 402 comments)
5. War story: the hardest bug I ever debugged (117 points | 31 comments)
6. Supabase (YC S20) Is Hiring a Senior Auth Engineer (Remote) ( | hide)
7. First C compiler source code from 1972 (45 points | 5 comments)
8. DJ With Apple Music launches to enable subscribers to mix their own sets (87 points | 33 comments)
9. Scientists Discover New Heavy-Metal Molecule 'Berkelocene' (7 points | discuss)
10. Building a Linux Container Runtime from Scratch (113 points | 14 comments)
11. Exploring Dynamic Dispatch in Rust (16 points | 3 comments)
12. The mysterious flow of fluid in the brain (82 points | 13 comments)
13. Botswana launches first satellite BOTSAT-1 aboard SpaceX Falcon 9 (280 points | 102 comments)
14. Problems with the heap (139 points | 32 comments)
15. MCP server for Ghidra (249 points | 39 comments)
16. DeepSeek-V3 Technical Report (66 points | 19 comments)
17. AI Reveals Secrets of Dendritic Growth in Thin Films (23 points | 4 comments)
18. Building a Firecracker-Powered Course Platform to Learn Docker and Kubernetes (98 points | 6 comments)
19. Unveiling the mysterious 'red sprite' lightning strikes over the Himalayas (25 points | 4 comments)
20. Gemma3 Function Calling (140 points | 17 comments)
21. The role of developer skills in agentic coding (148 points | 76 comments)
22. Writing a tiny undo/redo stack in JavaScript (98 points | 29 comments)
23. Rost – Rust Programming in German (42 points | 2 comments)
24. Waymos crash less than human drivers (213 points | 200 comments)
25. Writing Programs with Ncurses (82 points | 22 comments)
26. NotaGen: Symbolic Music Generation (63 points | 14 comments)
27. Oracle customers confirm data stolen in alleged cloud breach is valid (264 points | 55 comments)
28. The Website Hacker News Is Afraid to Discuss (11 points | 4 comments)
29. Has the decline of knowledge work begun? (193 points | 280 comments)
30. 'Naive' science fan faces jail for plutonium import (160 points | 124 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, March 27, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
